Articles.Content:
A really small plugin that I made to save myself from carpal syndrome.

Ever added a mod with a lot of part late in your Career save ? Remember how fun it was to go thru all the research node, scroll down the part list and research then ONE by ONE ?

NO MORE !

Now you'll get a dialog asking you if you want to Research Them All

DL : ResearchThemAll-1.2.0.0.zip

Source : https://github.com/sarbian/ResearchThemAll/

License : Licence : Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0): http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Edited October 16, 2014 by sarbian
Outstanding! Going to have to give it a try!
Man, you're truly a savior.
Thank Jedediah someone made this!

Will probably also keep peoples blood pressures adequate. This may well prove to be a medical breakthrough in the KSP mod community. No but seriously, having to scroll and click 50 times per mod is insanely frustrating. Thanks!
About time someone made this! Let there be no more pain in downloading mods late!
Thankyouthankyouthankyouthankyouthankyouthankyouthankyou

This goes into my permanent mods folder.

It is quite disappointing that Squad didn't come up with this in an official update.

AHA YES SOMEONE HAS DONE IT FINALLY!!!!! THANKS!

I made this suggestion ages ago (look in my signature)

(now to edit my signature and put a link to here )

Edited April 27, 2014 by Boamere
modders fixing squad laziness again!

Cute!

Only yesterday did I make myself a new sandbox-with-science-testbed-save and researched every node manually.

Hope you will keep it updated when researching individual parts costs stuff?
Simply glorious.

modders fixing squad laziness again!

I think you don't understand how software development works. If Squad would be lazy, there would be no KSP.
WOW! This is just what I dreamed for, just the other day i added taclife into one of my saves and it felt like i was purchasing stuff in r/d for 30mins.



BTW, I wrote this without ctrl+c and ctrl+v. And I held down shift by hand.

Technology! Gotta 'search 'em all!
Awesome! Super useful.

I literally wanted this yesterday!

Well, it's a bit late but YAY!

Hmm, it does not work for me.

Mod involved: LLL's SXT (updating from v12 to v13)

My steps:

- Deleted v12, loaded the game - no SXT, as intended

- Saved, installed v13, loaded game - upon entry in R&D I was given the choice "Research them all or Cancel"

- If I hit "Research them all" - they're shown as researched, but they show as "Purchase in R&D needed" in VAB\SPH, and if I go back in R&D, I get the same dialog again
When the new career mode comes out, this may be too much functionality, with each part having cost, you could eat up a lot of money researching parts you don't need.

you should probably know that a certain perso named xEvilReeperx made something like this except he only released this on someone else's thread called autounlockpartmodels just so you know

but overall great work here for those like me who hate clicking to unlock parts

Too bad he did not make a thread about it, It would have saved me a bit of time. But I like my code better

biohazard15 : if your research them by hand does it works ?

SpaceK531 : we will talk about it when .24 is out

biohazard15 : if your research them by hand does it works ?

Yes.

Tried to research some parts, then exit-enter R&D to use mod - same story, it doesn't work.
Put he savegame somewhere, I ll look it it tomorrow.
Works very well. Thanks.

Put he savegame somewhere, I ll look it it tomorrow.

Here you go: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-l1kSh8cSSAWWRWZjN2RTVJYmc/edit?usp=sharing

This save uses following mods:

- Active Texture Management

- AIES

- Beastly Science (aka Scoop-o-Matic)

- DMagic Orbital Science

- Visual Enhancements

- KAS

- Procedural Fairings

- KJR

- Kommit Nucleonics FtmN NERVAs

- KSO

- KSPX

- KW Rocketry

- LTech Science

- Kerbal Dust Experiment

- MechJeb

- Near Future Propulsion

- Octagon Corporation

- NovaPunch (note that I use latest test release)

- PandaJager Laboratories (Probodobodyne MastCam)

- Planetes Corp science parts

- PorkWorks Habitat pack

- Taurus HCV

- RCS BuildAid

- RLA Stockalike

- SCANSat

- SelectRoot

- StarShine Industries (most parts deleted due to bloated textures; I use only Sepratron II)

- StationScience (with Fuel Science addon)

- LLL SXT

- Tarsier Space Tech

- TAC Fuel Balancer

- A Mechanic is Jeb (MM KAS configs for many small parts)

- ModuleManager

Some mods use additional DLLs (like KSO that use Firespitter, RPM and other mods; in that case, I've used DLL and other resources provided by main mod's author)

All mods is regularly updated to latest versions.
